text: int main ( ) { int test ; scanf ( "%d" , & test ) ; while ( test > 0 ) { long int i , j , n , count = 0 , a [ 100005 ] , megacount = 0 ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ i ] ) ; } count = 1 ; for ( j = 2 ; j <= n ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ j ] >= a [ j - 1 ] ) { count ++ ; } else { megacount = megacount + ( ( count * ( count + 1 ) ) / 2 ) ; count = 1 ; } if ( j == n && a [ j ] >= a [ j - 1 ] ) { megacount = megacount + ( ( count * ( count + 1 ) ) / 2 ) ; } else if ( j == n && a [ j ] < a [ j - 1 ] ) megacount = megacount + 1 ; } if ( a [ 1 ] > a [ 2 ] ) megacount = megacount + 1 ; if ( n > 1 ) printf ( "%ld\n" , megacount ) ; else printf ( "1\n" ) ; test -- ; } return 0 ; }
